review: This is wonderful. I'd been looking at getting a Fire TV and really began to drool when this was released. My dilema was pretty simple, I'd just had it with moving our blu-ray player from room to room, as a flight of stairs was involved. Then there was the promo with Sling, and I bit. It came earlier this afternoon and it was a breeze to install. I seriously think my 5 year old could do it with minimal help. We set up and watched some Disney with the Sling app, and the kids are now watching some wind down Netflix before they go get ready for bed. And the picture is great... no hiccups like with dish or cable. The kids watched the tutorial with me, and they're already asking about the games!
